Detailed Description

< If your application uses PtDBContainer, the render shared library, phlib_render_11, must be in your search path.

CDBContainer::STANDARD_CONSTRUCTORS ( CDBContainer )
 

Creates a CContainer object of a certain size and position

int CDBContainer::setImageTypePaletteByte ( )
 

This format packs 1 pixel per byte, allowing up to 256 colors. This format indexes directly into the current palette

int CDBContainer::setImageTypeDirect888 ( )
 

This format packs each pixel into 3 bytes. Using this format you can represent a full 24 bit color image

int CDBContainer::setPhsContext ( )
 

Keeps the image in the Photon draw stream (PHS) as long as possible

int CDBContainer::setImageContext ( )
 

Draws to the memory image immediately
